My Journey

Curiosity has driven my journey from the start. I grew up taking hardware and software apart just to see how they worked, which shaped me into a creative, systems-oriented problem solver with a relentless taste for experimentation.

One project felt like unlocking a cheat code in a video game: building a capacitive touch panel controller entirely from scratch. Using a PIC18F microcontroller, I wrote every line of firmware to drive the FocalTech FT5X06 chip, bringing multi-touch gestures to life on a 4.3" Newhaven TFT display. Watching my code respond instantly to finger swipes was pure exhilaration‚Äîlike beating a boss level after weeks of grinding.

That same thrill carried me into enterprise systems, where I built VB.NET applications to track RMAs at a manufacturing firm in Elgin, IL, opening the door to financial platforms and business processes. Since then, I've mastered how data, workflows, and people intersect across complex organizations.

My focus has since expanded‚Äîbridging functional needs, technical architecture, and user experience with AI, machine learning, and intelligent automation. Today, I'm chasing that same video game rush: creating financial and operational systems that are efficient, intuitive, resilient, and genuinely inspiring to use.

Experience

Blue Owl Capital

üìç New York City, NY

Full-time

Principal - Financial Applications (Jan 2024 - Present, 2 yrs 1 mo)

Vice President - Financial Applications Manager (Jul 2021 - Dec 2023, 2 yrs 6 mos)

Visionary financial technology leader with a proven record of transforming and scaling enterprise financial systems, teams, and processes to support hypergrowth in public companies. As Head of Financial Applications, led the evolution from a single ERP platform to a multi-application landscape with over a dozen systems and ~50 integrations. Built foundational structures for support, team management, and process governance‚Äîwhere none existed‚Äîdriving cross-functional alignment across onshore and offshore teams. Enabled company growth from $45B to $300B in AUM through innovation, compliance execution, and systems leadership aligned with strategic finance goals.

Notable Achievements:

  • Enterprise Application Expansion: Scaled the financial applications environment from a single ERP system to a portfolio of over a dozen platforms supporting finance, legal, and operations.
  • Integration Ecosystem Growth: Built ~50 business-critical integrations from the ground up, enabling seamless data flow across departments and systems.
  • Organizational Structure & Process Design: Established foundational structures for support ticketing, team operations, and KPI tracking across onshore and offshore teams where none previously existed.
  • IPO Readiness & SOX Compliance: Delivered audit-ready, SOX-compliant reporting within one year of IPO by designing secure, controlled, and transparent financial system processes.
  • EPM Implementation Leadership: Led successful deployments of Oracle EPM modules including EDM, FCCS, and ARCS, supporting financial close, reconciliation, and planning activities.
  • Team Building & Leadership: Scaled the financial applications function from a solo role to a team of 15 high-performing professionals, each with ownership of key platforms.
  • Change Management Governance: Created and now lead a structured change management process and weekly Change Advisory Board, reducing risk and improving audit posture.
  • SDLC & Release Management: Instituted a finance-specific SDLC model, improving delivery discipline, quality, and traceability.
  • Monday.com Enterprise Adoption: Spearheaded enterprise-wide rollout of Monday.com for project management, task tracking, and change control.
  • Vendor Management & Contracts: Serve as the primary point of contact for all financial application vendor relationships, overseeing agreements, renewals, and strategic alignment.
  • C-Suite & Executive Partnership: Trusted advisor to executive leadership, including the Chief Accounting Officer, providing roadmap updates, risk overviews, and performance transparency.
